questions.instructions: Listen to the sample responses for ideas. Then discuss and record your own response.
questions.text: It's the first day of school after the summer vacations. A new student has joined the class.
prompts: Student A: Talk to the new student to make him/her feel comfortable.
Student B: Talk about yourself and ask a few questions about the new school.

questions.instructions: Read the information about your character. Then introduce yourself to your partner, as the character. Record your dialog.
questions.text: There is a local fair in the village. A new visitor to the village loses his way in this fair. He looks lost and confused. Someone who lives in the village decides to help him.
prompts:
